Chapter.Heading: Small Hoop Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small Hoop AllSmallHoop is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic hoop models from orders 2 to 8.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of Hoop formulas(Hoop).
x * y = y * x.
(x * y) * z = x * (y * z).
1 * x = x.
x + (y + z) = (x * y) + z.
x + x = 1.
(x + y) * x = (y + x) * y.
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has dependencies on the Magmaut package.
